meanings.definition: Having a lean and slender body type.
meanings.sent1: The ectomorphic girl had a slim figure.
meanings.sent2: She admired the ectomorphic models in the fashion magazine.
meanings.sent3: The ectomorphic cat squeezed through the narrow gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: His ectomorphic frame seemed almost ethereal in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The ectomorphic tree branches swayed gracefully in the wind.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of body fat and muscle mass.
meanings.sent1: The ectomorphic man struggled to gain weight despite eating a lot.
meanings.sent2: Her ectomorphic build made it challenging to build muscle.
meanings.sent3: The ectomorphic snowman melted quickly under the hot sun.
meanings.sent4: The ectomorphic skyscraper stood tall and slender against the skyline.
meanings.sent5: The ectomorphic robot moved swiftly and gracefully through the obstacle course.
